data.title: Make Bookmarklets
data.copy: I created a bookmarklet generator with modern Javascript safeguards in place. This site has really taken off. I guess people like making bookmarklets too.

data.title: Adam Biel Audio
data.copy: Made a 100% free site using modern web tools for a buddy of mine. Created a decoupled website that uses google spreadsheets as our CMS. Very fun project with single build/deploy step.

data.title: Looksee
data.copy: I made a Chrome Extension for debugging layout on the fly. Additionally you can apply a shader as well. Add any css selectors to outline or highlight elements on the page.
